p: In the following machine learning algorithms are used for automatic diagnosis of COVID-19. Currently there is a lack of acceptable datasets that could be used for prediction of COVID-19 in patients. One dataset is recently uploaded at [ 31] which contains 5644 samples with 111 attributes provided by Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, Brazil. This dataset contains anonymized data samples collected by RT-PCR and additional laboratory tests during a visit to the hospital. In a recent preprint paper [ 32], some results are provided on the diagnosis of COVID-19 patients using a subset of the dataset in Ref. [ 31].
